thread.title: 22-year-old robbed overnight in Carrollton area
thread.title_full: 22-year-old robbed overnight in Carrollton area - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Sam Winstrom, Assignment Editor
title: 22-year-old robbed overnight in Carrollton area
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - Police are investigating an armed robbery in the Carrollton neighborhood.
According to NOPD, three unknown black males, one armed with a gun and one armed with a knife, approached a 22-year-old man in the 1400 block of Dante Street around 11:30 p.m. on Oct. 17. The three men demanded the 22-year-old's property, but he refused.
One of the armed men then struck the 22-year-old in the face with a gun before robbing him.
Anyone with information on this incident is asked to call CRIMESTOPPERS at 504-822-1111.
Copyright 2015 WVUE .
